4.title: Wisdom

episode of.title: Kundalini Yoga: A Journey Through the Chakras with Maya Fiennes (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Musician and yoga teacher Maya Fiennes takes you on a journey through the Chakras, introducing a new Kundalini Yoga practice for each individual Chakra. Chakras are energy centers that absorb life force or prana from the universe and are distributed through the nadis - energy channels to the nervous system, endocrine glands and circulatory systems. Become better able to face everyday challenges.
